name: arrayInsertAt
description: Inserts a value at the specified position in the array. If the element is inserted before the end of the array, ColdFusion shifts the positions of all elements with a higher index to make room.

params.name: array
params.description: The array which will have the new element inserted.

params.name: position
params.description:
The numerical index in the array where the new element will be inserted.
 Must be less than or equal to the length of the array.
 Remember ColdFusion arrays start at 1 not 0.

examples.title: Insert an Item in an Array at Position 2
